title: Tokyo motor show 2019: star cars
text:
The 2019 Tokyo motor show has opened at the Japanese capital's Big Sight arena. There are two press and trade days, then it opens to the public from Thursday October 24 and runs until Monday November 4.

Although the Japanese show has become renowned for weird and wacky "mobility solutions" there is always a globally important new car on show – this year it's the reveal of the all-new Honda Jazz, beloved by Honest John and Telegraph readers alike.

Nissan Ariya concept

Define ‘a few’, for that was the otherwise undefined timespan applied to the IMX concept seen at Tokyo two years ago. In ‘a few years’ we will produce a fully electric C-segment crossover, Nissan said back then, and now we see...
description: The 2019 Tokyo motor show has opened at the Japanese capital's Big Sight arena.
